parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate or political party participating in the elections.  It focuses on a religious event at a church.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and aims to reach a wide audience within specified geographical locations in Romania, inviting them to a religious service.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to inform people about a religious event, not to influence their vote in the parliamentary elections. There is no mention of any political candidate or party, nor any attempt to sway public opinion towards a particular political stance.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post can be considered a form of community journalism, informing the public about a local event of religious significance. It provides factual information about the event's date, time, and location.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express personal opinions related to the elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1744040569689415</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes a religious event at a church in Botoșani.  The content is purely informational, announcing the dates and times of religious services. There is no mention of any political candidate, party, or any attempt to influence voters' choices in the parliamentary elections. The paid advertisement targets a geographical area, but this is for disseminating information about a local religious event, not for political campaigning.  The post does not violate Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006 because it does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda.  It does not directly refer to a candidate or party, its objective is not electoral, and it remains within the bounds of community news reporting.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Vocea Botosani</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
